Class CabinComponent

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.components.BaseComponent
it.polimi.ingsw.model.components.CabinComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CabinComponent extends BaseComponent

CabinComponent

This class models a crew cabin on a spaceship. Cabins are used to host human or alien crew members. Each cabin can hold a specific number of crew, depending on the alien type and its capacity.

    • setCrew

      public void setCrew(SpaceShip ship, int new_crew, AlienType type)
      This method sets the crew in the SpaceShip
      Parameters:
      ship - SpaceShip to which you want set the crew.
      new_crew - the number of crewmates you want to set.
      type - AlienType the type of aliens you want to set.
      Throws:
      NegativeArgumentException - if the crew size is zero or negative.
      IllegalArgumentException - if AlienType is a collector and not a single alien type.
      ArgumentTooBigException - if the crew size exceeds AlienType's max capacity.
      UnsupportedAlienCabinException - if the crew type inserted is incompatible with the type in cabin.
